snippet: The Darrell Royal humor never faded, even as he sank deeper into Alzheimer’s disease.
abstract: Box Seats article by author Jim Dent remembers late Texas football coach Darrell Royal, who led team to three national championships victories before retiring at age 52; says Royal never lost his sense of humor, even as he sank deeper into Alzheimer’s disease.
lead_paragraph: The Darrell Royal humor never faded, even as he sank deeper into Alzheimer’s disease.

headline.seo: Mind Faded, Darrell Royal’s Wisdom and Humor Intact Till End
headline.main: Mind Faded, but Wisdom and Humor Stayed Intact
headline.print_headline: Mind Faded, But Wisdom And Humor Stayed Intact
